attributes.action: force all judges to watch every episode of Judge Judy before being allowed to serve.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Judge Judy is full of wisdom and discernment and she is not afraid to minister justice to those that come before her court.  She tells it as it is!  Potential judges would learn from her techniques and delivery.  Therefore, I believe that the Judge Judy Series should be a compulsory part of their training.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
